siminov.core.events

Interface IDatabaseEvents


  • public interface IDatabaseEvents
    Exposes methods which deal with events associated with database operation's. It has methods such as (databaseCreated, databaseDroped, tableCreated, tableDroped, indexCreated).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDatabaseCreated(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor)
      This event is fired when database gets created as per database descriptor.
      void onDatabaseDropped(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor)
      This event is fired when database is dropped.
      void onIndexCreated(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor, EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor, EntityDescriptor.Index index)
      This event is fired when a index is created on table.
      void onIndexDropped(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor, EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor, EntityDescriptor.Index index)
      This event is fired when a index is dropped.
      void onTableCreated(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor, EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor)
      This event is fired when a table is created.
      void onTableDropped(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor, EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor)
      This event is fired when a table is dropped.

    • Method Detail

      • onDatabaseCreated

        void onDatabaseCreated(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor)
        This event is fired when database gets created as per database descriptor.
        Parameters:
        databaseDescriptor - contains meta data associated with database.

      • onDatabaseDropped

        void onDatabaseDropped(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor)
        This event is fired when database is dropped.
        Parameters:
        databaseDescriptor - contains meta data associated with dropped database.

      • onTableCreated

        void onTableCreated(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor,
                  EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor)
        This event is fired when a table is created.
        Parameters:
        entityDescriptor - contains meta data associated with created table.

      • onTableDropped

        void onTableDropped(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor,
                  EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor)
        This event is fired when a table is dropped.
        Parameters:
        entityDescriptor - contains meta data associated with dropped table.

      • onIndexCreated

        void onIndexCreated(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor,
                  EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor,
                  EntityDescriptor.Index index)
        This event is fired when a index is created on table.
        Parameters:
        entityDescriptor - contains meta data associated with table on which index is created.
        index - meta data about index got created.

      • onIndexDropped

        void onIndexDropped(DatabaseDescriptor databaseDescriptor,
                  EntityDescriptor entityDescriptor,
                  EntityDescriptor.Index index)
        This event is fired when a index is dropped.
        Parameters:
        entityDescriptor - contains meta data associated with table on which index is dropped.
        index - meta data about index got dropped.
